main.name: Justin Yun
main.bio: I graduated from University of Colorado Boulder with a B.A in Computer Science. I'm currently working as a Quality Analyst Engineer at Travelport.

work.title: Quality Analyst Engineer
work.description: Developed simulators for testing in-house software using Visual C++ and MFC. Created and maintained documentation for our in-house applications and features that were implemented. Collaborated with other dev teams for solving various types of problems.

work.title: Quality Assurance Intern
work.description: Developed functions for optimizing automation testing by compressing input files such as XML. Enhanced and updated front-end of Travelport's applications. Updated Travelport's automated test schedules and results for faster load times.

work.title: Student Technician (IT)
work.description: Responsible for maintaining over 500 classrooms on CU Boulder campus. Inspect classrooms to ensure proper functionality of electronic equipment.

projects.title: First Portfolio
projects.category: A static portfolio that was made with HTML/CSS and hosted with GitHub.

projects.title: Virtual Reality Drone Game
projects.category: Control a physical drone with VR
